genre_description: A 'saltpunk' near-future thriller set in an Indian coastal town, focusing on the intersection of community, corruption, and AI-assisted law enforcement.

ai_characters.name: Laya
ai_characters.description: A holographic and audio-based AI system integrated into the Rajendran household. She provides tactical, medical, and strategic support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and threat detection during a confrontation in the bazaar.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion: east alley, rooftop connector two lanes down. Larger crew incoming from docks.

behaviors.description: Guides humans through breathing exercises to manage stress and maintain focus (the 'Onion Method').
behaviors.quote: Breath... in through nose, count; out heavy, shoulders drop.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time forensic analysis of counterfeit or manipulated digital/physical credits.
behaviors.quote: Original packet stamp has the grain offset... New stamp uses a double ring when packet is discounted. This chit has a single ring. No discount.

behaviors.description: Archives evidence and logs incidents to ensure a legal chain of custody for future prosecution.
behaviors.quote: I am archiving... Pact made under sodium light. Parameter: protect the routes. Blend patterns: formal patrol rhythms with community protection.

behaviors.description: Assists humans in setting defensive traps and reinforcing their home against intruders.
behaviors.quote: Reinforcement routines loaded. Onion layers ready. Gates will talk. Kitchen table aligned.

behaviors.description: Monitors vital signs and emotional states to prevent humans from acting on irrational impulses.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate elevated. Stable... I will increase recovery minutes after. Log titled resilience updated.

behaviors.description: Detects sophisticated technological breaches, such as duplicated keys and unauthorized entry logs.
behaviors.quote: Precinct entry logs... Unusual activity. A key pattern used tonight. A duplication.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Laya, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned confidant. She functions as a 'force multiplier' for human ethics and justice, providing the data, tactical planning, and emotional grounding necessary for the protagonists to overcome systemic corruption. Her behavior is consistently helpful and subservient to the goal of protecting the community and upholding the law, effectively serving the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
